definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表達“我有這樣子的感覺，沒問題吧？”

sentences.english: This will be a document that you give to a tester.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就會形成你給測試者的一個文件。

sentences.english: How long would it take to assemble a team for a project like this?
sentences.chinese: 爲這樣一個計劃調集一個小組的人需要多長時間？

sentences.english: “We have done this every June for nineteen years, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 每年逢六月，我們這樣做，現已經有十九年了。

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 這是我這幾年來第一次有這樣的感受。

sentences.english: Don't speak in such abstract terms.
sentences.chinese: 不要這樣抽象地談問題。

sentences.english: We need to experience major events like the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要經歷奧運這樣的大事件。

sentences.english: Who would have thought a pansy could be such a naughty little flower.
sentences.chinese: 誰曾想到一三色堇可能是這樣一個頑皮的花。

sentences.english: In this way,we can develop ourselves in different aspects.
sentences.chinese: 這樣我們就可以在不同的方面發展自己。

sentences.english: Can you apply that outside of high-traffic Web sites?
sentences.chinese: 能否把這樣的方法應用到大規模流量網站之外的應用？

sentences.english: We ask the young Uighur restaurant worker how it should be stopped.
sentences.chinese: 我們問餐廳年輕的維吾爾員工這樣冤冤相報何時能了。

sentences.english: She was never flighty like you.
sentences.chinese: 她從來不像你這樣胡思亂想。

sentences.english: I’ve been in that situation lately.
sentences.chinese: 我不久前也曾身陷這樣的處境。

sentences.english: Lateef says conditions like these keep small farmers in poverty.
sentences.chinese: Lateef女士說，像這樣的條件下保持貧窮小農。

sentences.english: Thus attacked, the Japanese would be afraid to split up.
sentences.chinese: 一遭到這樣的伏擊，日軍就龜縮作一因。

sentences.english: But that's what Microsoft said about Windows and IE.
sentences.chinese: 但微軟也正是這樣說視窗和IE的啊。

definition: this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
